title: Stir-fried Vegetables
summary: Stir-fried Vegetables might be just the side dish you are searching for. This recipe serves 4 and costs 96 cents per serving. One serving contains 138 calories, 8g of protein, and 9g of fat. If you have bok choy, soy sauce; more, tofu, and a few other ingredients on hand, you can make it. 1 person found this recipe to be scrumptious and satisfying. It is a good option if you're following a gluten free and vegan diet. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes roughly 45 minutes. With a spoonacular score of 68%, this dish is good.
